title: People can't fathom my intellect.
body:
I feel like it is not said enough, how much of a sheer genius I actually am. I mean yeah, i'm one individual person, but INTELLECTUALLY, i'm worth atleast 10 people. My contributions will far surpass anyone else, and I don't blame them, because they can't help it. Not everyone is born with a >140 IQ. It is literally a combination of genetics and God's will. 

You might call this delusion, out of some misguided, jealous perspective, but for those who are looking INTO THEIR MONITOR to see what I type, know that the person typing this will always be better than you at everything you mentally set your mind to.

Good-day.
